string-array.name: script_create
string-array.item: CREATE TABLE [QUAKE] ([ID] VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY,[TITLE] VARCHAR(255) NULL,[LINK] VARCHAR(2000) NULL,[DATE] TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NULL,[MAGNITUDE] FLOAT NULL,[LATITUDE] FLOAT NULL,[LONGITUDE] FLOAT NULL,[ELEVATION] INTEGER NULL)
